website_summaries.verdict: The 6th version of the Nike Downshifter gained the favor of a lot of neutral runners and shoe enthusiasts. They stated that they felt contented and secured when trying it on the pavement. For many of them, the underfoot cushioning felt reliable and consistent, as did the upper cover system. There were some who didn’t enjoy this version, but that didn’t stop the Downshifter 6 from getting such prominence.
pros: A runner wrote that the mesh material used in the Nike Downshifter 6 had a bit of stretch to it, basically allowing their feet to feel unrestricted even when the material is hugging it
Testers noted that the padding in the upper unit granted the dimensions of their feet with some cushioning during the running sessions
The testers appreciated the inclusion of a molded insole, which gave contoured support to the foot-pad and the arch
The underfoot cushioning was commended by many because of its soft and responsive nature
This shoe didn’t feel heavy and it didn’t feel too lightweight, according to some runners
for them, it had an adequate weight that’s agreeable for many activities
The Downshifter 6 looked visually appealing to a lot of those who tried it
‘Comfortable’ was a word many runners used to describe this shoe, as well as their time wearing it
Based on a number of comments, this shoe was lauded for its affordable price
The flat laces of this model gained recognition because they didn’t unravel easily
cons: Some of the testers felt that the Downshifter 6 was a bit large for their feet
The toe box was a bit narrow for a few runners
they wrote that it tended to clump their toes together uncomfortably
The tongue was a bit lumpy and irritating to the skin, a tester complained

customer_reviews.title: Left me questioning....
customer_reviews.text: These are cute & good but im honestly not too sure on they’re authenticity. There was no logo on the inside of the shoe at all so that left me with a lot of questions. Other than that they are nice shoes & durable & seem like Nike’s in every other aspect. Idk if i would’ve paid as much for knock offs though 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: KILLV KYKY 👽🖖🏽

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son has wide feet. It's hard finding him comfortable shoes. He said these shoes were very comfortable. The look slick as well. Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Elissa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my adult son who is autistic, so comfort is EVERYTHING! He loved them the minute he put them on. There was no "adjustment" period where he had to get used to them. We always appreciate that!
customer_reviews.author: D. E.

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Have become my husband's new favorite shoe. Found this style at the store, but they didn't have his size, so found them here on Amazon. He loves the color and the fit, he's begging me to order more pairs for him.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Nikes yes
customer_reviews.text: My son s feet are constantly growing hes 11yrs old wearing a sz 9 and every thing has to be nike..he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow for wide foot
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe. Unfortunately it is too narrow so I will have to return. My husband has a very large and wide foot. I won’t be able to do it until after the holidays so I hope this will be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Kim L. Archer

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, now not so much (2 months)
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these shoes just over two months, cared for meticulously. They already “squeak” when I walk (no moisture) and the fabric inside on the top near the toes already ripped on one. They were great for about a month. The second month not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin R.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable, even for inflexible “bad” feet
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a former athlete and has ruined his feet - this particular type of Nike shoe is one of the only ones that is always comfortable for him - the downshifter. He now has 4 or 5 pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Farina

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and one of the best running shoes I’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, Comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Wife picked them out. Pleasantly surprised with style, fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S. Potts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Use them all the time. They look great and are excellent sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good looking
customer_reviews.text: Love the downshifter. Very comfortable. Love the look of them. Unfortunately I only wear to the gym and not to run. I do not think these would make good running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow shoe. They run a little on the smaller side. Looks nice though.
customer_reviews.author: KristyPalomino

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Your basic Nike running shoe. Fits as expected. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas and he loves it. He says it’s very comfortable and fits well. I’ve been thinking of getting one for myself too. This was a buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Solid workout shoe but low durability
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and light weight, but unfortunately begins to develop rips and tears pretty quickly typical of low cost Nike shoes
customer_reviews.author: Pragmatic

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift for my good friend and he liked how they fit and how they looked.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Eccher

customer_reviews.title: This one is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe great fit Awesome color combination. The shoe is light but very well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and very comfy
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit my guy well he absolutely loved them
customer_reviews.author: Sept2868

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Downshifter 9 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The Nike Downshifter 9 with lightweight mesh upper provides breathable comfort. On the heel and in the metatarsal area, the closed mesh provides structured support for sprints. The flex grooves under the foot adapt to the movement, while the continuous foam softly cushions every step.
